actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-28.

official_title: Resolution authorizing the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service to conduct full and complete investigations and studies of all matters within its jurisdiction under the rules of the House or the laws of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service to conduct full and complete investigations and studies of all matters within its jurisdiction under the rules of the House or the laws of the United States. Requires the committee to submit to the House, not later than January 2, 1975, a report on the activities of that committee during the Congress ending at noon on January 3, 1975.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service to conduct full and complete investigations and studies of all matters within its jurisdiction under the rules of the House or the laws of the United States.
